title: Good Bye Pool Party Minions.
body:
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/gkkbvtoQuwI/hqdefault.jpg

You gave us joy in each game. 
You gave us reason to play together. 
You gave us purpose to win games aside from bragging rights. 
You gave us a goal to play toward. 

We will never forget going into lanes together. 
We will never forget taking towers and Nexus together 
We will never forget the gold you gave us 
We will never forget typing "MINIONS OP" when you killed a champion. 


We will never forget the fun we had together. 


**PATCH 5.12: NEVER FORGET**

http://24.media.tumblr.com/ed776e5b3ce330175221c81287f5c6cf/tumblr_mfx45grBBh1r8tyjfo1_500.gif

replies.body: Forever in our hearts.  <3
Any chance we could make minion skins a thing?
It's certainly a possibility. :3 What kind of minions would you want to see? I kind of want trick or treaters. :x

Dravens. I want to see 12-14 dravens every wave.


Even with the clarity thing though, there are plenty of options. sailors/pirates. voidlings. mecha minions. santa elves. I'm sure some people more creative than me can come up with something.
Every minion is just wearing a Draven mask.
OMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOMGOGMOMGOMG YOUDIDDIT!

{{champion:17}} U sure?
Oh my goodness. I can't upvote this one enough. Maybe the draven minion skins can change if there's a Draven on the field (they'll copy his skin)?

Beside Pool Party & Harrowing (which is what I assume you meant by trick or treater),we could also have some Snowdown minions (poro shields please) & URF minions (golden spatula wands please).

I understand that if minion skins ever do become a thing,there would likely be a limit to what can be done due to a thing called clarity.So no drastic redesigns,just added accessories & changed weaponary.Unless you guys & gals at Riot would be willing to go that far for minion skins (if it happens of course).

You're correct that clarity is certainly a concern, since minions are a significant part of gameplay - especially when it comes to knowing what kind of minion you're trying to last hit. 

I mean, if there were no clarity rules, I hear there are these yellow minions in this movie that's coming out soon. :P
I was curious, do you think you guys will ever make map specific minions? Like minions for TT, HB (or CS?)? I'd love to see some spooky minions on 3s.
I think this makes a lot of sense. Howling Abyss has different turrets as Twisted Treeline and Summoners Rift, as will Butcher's Bridge. Why NOT have custom minions for each map?

Some feedback in that regard: the purple lays the blue side minions had looked similar to baron enhanced minions. This wasn't an issue most of the time (i knew if the enemy had baron or not) but when i knew they had baron but i didn't see an enemy around, it looked like they were around because the minions had the purple color on them, even though they didn't have the buff. I had to do a double take to tell if the purple i was seeing was a baron buff or not.

URF minions. 

Caster carrying spatula,

cannon minions riding a robot manatee

stuff like that.

Poro minions. I want to see how much the community's cs drops when they have to choose to kill a cute little poro for the extra gold. You could have melee minions be normal poros, mage minions be poros throwing snowballs, cannon minions be poros driving little cannons around, and super minions can be miniature poro-kings

Edit: Misspelt cannon minions. Minions shoot artillery rounds, not argue about what is official league lore.
Thanks for the PROJECT: Minions
